snippet: Preservationists are working to restore Richard Oswald’s 1919 German film, “Different From the Others,” the earliest known full-length feature to showcase gay characters.
abstract: Preservationists are working to restore 1919 Richard Oswald film Different From the Others, earliest known full-length feature to showcase gay characters; film was banned in Germany, where Nazis later destroyed every copy they could find.
lead_paragraph: Preservationists are working to restore Richard Oswald’s 1919 German film, “Different From the Others,” the earliest known full-length feature to showcase gay characters.

headline.seo: ‘Different From the Others,’ a 1919 Film on Homosexuality
headline.main: A Daring Film, Silenced No More
headline.print_headline: A Daring Film, Silenced No More
